name: gravotator
description:
A very short game made for MiniJam 66. Was much more inspired by the limitation (2-button input) than the theme (sweets) so there's not really any sweets to be found here. There's more level design to explore, but I ran out of time as I was doing other stuff that weekend as well.

Music:
Study And Relax by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5764-study-and-relax
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
